sqlMap.statement: SELECT PV.PRNT_VND_PK FROM PRNT_VND PV WHERE PV.GLBL_CMPY_CD = #glblCmpyCd# AND (PV.PRNT_VND_CD = #prntVndCd# OR PV.PRNT_VND_NM = #prntVndNm#) AND PV.PRNT_VND_TP_CD = #prntVndTpCd# AND PV.EZCANCELFLAG = '0'

SELECT PV.PRNT_VND_NM ,PV.PRNT_VND_TP_CD FROM PRNT_VND PV WHERE PV.GLBL_CMPY_CD = #glblCmpyCd# AND PV.TAX_PAYER_ID = #taxPayerId#
#excludeTaxPayerIdList[]#
AND PV.EZCANCELFLAG = '0'
SELECT PV.PRNT_VND_NM ,PV.PRNT_VND_TP_CD FROM PRNT_VND PV WHERE PV.GLBL_CMPY_CD = #glblCmpyCd# AND PV.TAX_PAYER_ID = #taxPayerId# AND PV.EZCANCELFLAG = '0'
SELECT STC.SHIP_TO_CUST_PK FROM SHIP_TO_CUST STC WHERE STC.GLBL_CMPY_CD = #glblCmpyCd# AND STC.SHIP_TO_CUST_CD = #shipToCustCd# AND STC.EZCANCELFLAG = '0'
SELECT V.CMPY_PK ,V.PTY_LOC_PK ,V.VND_PK FROM VND V WHERE V.GLBL_CMPY_CD = #glblCmpyCd# AND V.VND_CD = #vndCd# AND V.EZCANCELFLAG = '0'

SELECT V.VND_PK FROM PRNT_VND PV ,VND V WHERE PV.GLBL_CMPY_CD = #glblCmpyCd# AND PV.PRNT_VND_CD = #prntVndCd# AND V.GLBL_CMPY_CD = PV.GLBL_CMPY_CD AND V.PRNT_VND_PK = PV.PRNT_VND_PK AND V.LOC_NM = #locNm# AND PV.EZCANCELFLAG = '0' AND V.EZCANCELFLAG = '0'
SELECT GC.STD_CCY_CD FROM GLBL_CMPY GC WHERE GC.GLBL_CMPY_CD = #glblCmpyCd# AND GC.EZCANCELFLAG = '0'
